original: @76a / rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76a / rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tantra r'a dza shr'i la ghu sa wa ra n'a ma /
analyzed: tantra r'a dza shr'i la ghu sa wa ra n'a ma /
translated: Tantra-raja-shri-laghusvara-nama.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious Shri Heruka Tantra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bhagavan Vajrasattva.

original: de nas gsang ba bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba bshad par bya //
translated: Now the secret will be explained,🔽in brief, not extensively.

original: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min; ;dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min; ;dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor //
translated: The union with Shri Heruka

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin //
translated: accomplishes all desired goals.

original: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //
analyzed: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //
translated: It is the guru of gurus,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: the binding of the dakini net.🔽In the supreme secret and delightful,

original: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na; ;thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na; ;thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: the nature of all is always present.

original: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
translated: The hero who is the nature of all dakinis,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
translated: Vajrasattva, the supreme bliss,

original: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'//
analyzed: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'//
translated: is the self-arisen, victorious hero.

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
translated: This is the binding of the dakini net.

original: sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams //
analyzed: sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams //
translated: Those who arise from the method of sound

original: dam tshig spyod ba'i spyod yul yin //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod ba'i spyod yul yin //
translated: are the domain of conduct in the conduct of samaya.

original: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba //
translated: Difficult to find in the three worlds,

original: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
analyzed: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
translated: it is situated in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyar //
analyzed: bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyar //
translated: The churned and the churner are united.

original: ji lta ba ni de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji lta ba ni de bzhin du //
translated: Just as it is,

original: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
analyzed: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
translated: endowed with mantra recitation, meditation, and so forth,

original: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni //
translated: the knowledge of the ritual of union

original: rnal 'byor bla na med pa yi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla na med pa yi //
translated: in the unsurpassed yoga🔽is taught in the tantras.

original: @76b rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis //
analyzed: @76b rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis //
translated: Listen!🔽Even with the middling and supreme inhalations,

original: dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang // dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //🔽rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang // dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang // rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du //
translated: along with scented water,🔽the yogī should always make offerings

original: rigs ldan rtag tu mchod par bya //
analyzed: rigs ldan rtag tu mchod par bya //
translated: to the one of the family at special times.

original: pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma //
analyzed: pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma //
translated: The messenger is innate perfection,

original: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste //
analyzed: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste //
translated: supreme, middling, and inferior.

original: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
analyzed: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
translated: With the mind fully absorbed,

original: 'dod pa yi ni dngos grub bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa yi ni dngos grub bya //
translated: one should accomplish the desired attainment.🔽With one's own substance, the bindu, one should make offerings to the buddhas

original: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
analyzed: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
translated: and bodhisattvas.🔽By seeing, touching,

original: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa 'am ni dran pa yis //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa 'am ni dran pa yis //
translated: hearing, or remembering,

original: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba //
translated: And will be freed from all evil.

original: de lta nyid du the tshom /
analyzed: de lta nyid du the tshom /
translated: Thus, there is no doubt.

original: med; ;rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /
analyzed: med; ;rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /
translated: The yogi himself is the supreme merit,

original: dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa //
analyzed: dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa //
translated: The purifier, the destroyer of evil,🔽And will be accomplished through the recitation of mantra,

original: gsang sngags bzlas dang bsam gtan dang // bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas dang bsam gtan dang // bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Meditation, and bliss.

original: dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya //
analyzed: dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya //
translated: The commitments should always be maintained.

original: shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos //🔽dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos // dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du //
translated: The practitioner who is well equipoised🔽Will not attain empowerment and siddhi

original: dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //🔽sbrang rtsi mar dang ga pur bcas //
analyzed: dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur // sbrang rtsi mar dang ga pur bcas //
translated: In the maṇḍala if the commitments are damaged.🔽Honey, butter, and asafoetida

original: tsandan dmar po dang spyar ba //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po dang spyar ba //
translated: Mixed with red sandalwood

original: tshogs kyi nang du bzhag ba ni //
analyzed: tshogs kyi nang du bzhag ba ni //
translated: Should be placed in the gaṇacakra.

original: thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin //
analyzed: thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin //
translated: All hold the sign of the vajra.

original: ming med mthe bong rtse sbyar bas //
analyzed: ming med mthe bong rtse sbyar bas //
translated: The ring finger and thumb should be joined

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu spyad //🔽myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu spyad // myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin //
translated: And always used by the aware yogi.🔽By tasting it, one will obtain

original: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: The eternal siddhi, like a drink of peace.

original: 'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur //
translated: This is the deathless half-mora.

original: dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin //
translated: It is the entrance to all powers.

original: @77a *// mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni //
analyzed: @77a *// mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni //
translated: The great hero of the four offerings

original: yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste //🔽dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
analyzed: yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste // dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
translated: does what is desired by the mind.🔽The two abhishekas are the union

original: snyoms par zhugs pa'ang de nyid 'dzin //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa'ang de nyid 'dzin //
translated: of the one who is in union with the one who holds reality.

original: lha dang mi yi bde ba ni //🔽bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //🔽de lta bur ni byed pa yi //
analyzed: lha dang mi yi bde ba ni // bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis // de lta bur ni byed pa yi //
translated: The bliss of gods and humans

original: bcu drug char ni mi phod do //
analyzed: bcu drug char ni mi phod do //
translated: is not even a sixteenth part🔽of the bliss of the vajra holder🔽who is created by the four offerings.

original: ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam //
analyzed: ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam //
translated: In a mountain, a thicket, a forest,🔽on the banks of a great river,

original: chu bo che rnams ngogs dag dang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
analyzed: chu bo che rnams ngogs dag dang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
translated: or in a primordial charnel ground,

original: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //🔽dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya // dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: one should draw the maṇḍala there.

original: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
translated: This concludes the first chapter, the chapter on entering the maṇḍala, from the Tantra of the Dialogue with Subāhu.🔽The maṇḍala ground should be anointed

original: der ni lci ba ma lhung bas //
analyzed: der ni lci ba ma lhung bas //
translated: with cow dung that has not fallen on the ground.

original: dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /
translated: The maṇḍala ground should be anointed

original: dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yis //🔽dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te //
analyzed: dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yis //🔽dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te //
translated: with charnel ground ash and the five elixirs.

original: der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam //
analyzed: der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam //
translated: There one should begin the maṇḍala.

original: gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis //
analyzed: gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis //
translated: Having meditated there,

original: dur khrod du ni kun tu brtag /🔽ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod so phag ldan pa yi //
analyzed: dur khrod du ni kun tu brtag / ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod so phag ldan pa yi //
translated: one should search for a charnel ground.🔽One should draw the excellent maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya //
translated: with charnel ground ash and charnel ground bricks.

original: slob dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: slob dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: The master has the characteristics of virtue,

original: yang dag shos shing rgyud shes pa //
analyzed: yang dag shos shing rgyud shes pa //
translated: is well trained, and knows the tantras,

original: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes //
analyzed: dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes //
translated: knows the mantra of glorious Heruka,

original: khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang // sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro //🔽thod pas spyi bor @77b brgyan byas shing //
analyzed: khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang // sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro // thod pas spyi bor @77b brgyan byas shing //
translated: is not angry, is pure, is skilled, knows union, and has gone beyond wisdom.🔽His head is adorned with a skull,🔽his body is smeared with the ashes of the dismembered,

original: yan lag bral bas byugs pa dang // gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing //
analyzed: yan lag bral bas byugs pa dang // gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing //
translated: his body is adorned with braids,

original: rus pa'i phreng la sogs pas brgyan //
analyzed: rus pa'i phreng la sogs pas brgyan //
translated: and he is adorned with a garland of bones.🔽He is adorned with a single topknot on his head,

original: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang //
analyzed: dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang // rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang //
translated: and a garland of bones hangs down.

original: kha tv'am ga ni lag na gnas //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni lag na gnas //
translated: He holds a khaṭvāṅga in his hand.

original: bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas //
translated: Having made himself glorious Heruka,

original: de 'og khrag 'thung dpal dran bya //
analyzed: de 'og khrag 'thung dpal dran bya //
translated: Then one should recall the glorious blood-drinker.🔽This wheel should be placed in the heart.

original: 'khor lo 'di ni snying gar dgod; ;bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di ni snying gar dgod; ;bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas //
translated: Having thus armored oneself,

original: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
analyzed: ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod //
translated: one should place the ramparts in the directions.

original: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
translated: Having thus armored oneself,

original: 'og tu yang ni mtshon cha dgod //
analyzed: 'og tu yang ni mtshon cha dgod //
translated: one should also place weapons below.

original: 'khor lo mtshon cha'i phreng ba dag /
analyzed: 'khor lo mtshon cha'i phreng ba dag /
translated: The wheel and the garland of weapons

original: steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid //
analyzed: steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid //
translated: above, a net of arrows.

original: slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du //🔽gur byas de ni go char 'gyur //
analyzed: slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du // gur byas de ni go char 'gyur //
translated: Again, having made oneself a sky-goer,🔽that becomes the armor.

original: de ltar go cha de bgos na //
analyzed: de ltar go cha de bgos na //
translated: Having thus donned that armor,

original: sum cu pas kyang mi phyed do //
analyzed: sum cu pas kyang mi phyed do //
translated: even the thirty-two cannot penetrate it.

original: de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing //
translated: Thus having well protected oneself

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
translated: and adorned with mantras and mudras,🔽one should draw the terrifying mandala

original: dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i //🔽dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i // dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya //
translated: that bestows the great accomplishments.

original: de nas sems med srad bu 'am //
analyzed: de nas sems med srad bu 'am //
translated: Then, with a thread without life

original: ru dhi ra ni chen pos brlan //
analyzed: ru dhi ra ni chen pos brlan //
translated: or moistened with great blood,🔽one should lay out the terrifying mandala

original: he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /🔽dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /🔽dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya //
translated: of the supreme city of glorious Heruka.

original: khru gang khru bzhi'am khru brgyad pa //🔽sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa //
analyzed: khru gang khru bzhi'am khru brgyad pa // sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa //
translated: One cubit, four cubits, or eight cubits,🔽With four doors and four corners,

original: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with four archways.

original: sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad //
analyzed: sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad //
translated: The mantrin should double it.

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod //
translated: Worship the supreme dakini net.

original: de yi dbus su padma ni //🔽'dab bcas @78a *//
analyzed: de yi dbus su padma ni // 'dab bcas @78a *//
translated: In its center, one should place🔽A lotus with petals,

original: lte bar 'bar dang bcas //🔽ge sar yang dag ldan par gzhag /🔽lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: lte bar 'bar dang bcas // ge sar yang dag ldan par gzhag / lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni //
translated: With a pericarp and filaments.🔽In the center, one should place the hero,

original: 'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: Bhairava, the terrifying one,

original: mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar //
analyzed: mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar //
translated: Radiant, blazing,

original: ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad //
analyzed: ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad //
translated: Laughing loudly with a ha ha sound,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan //
translated: Adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'//
analyzed: bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'//
translated: Excellent, with three eyes and four faces,🔽Wearing an elephant hide,

original: glang po'i phags pa rnam par bgos; ;smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes //
analyzed: glang po'i phags pa rnam par bgos; ;smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes //
translated: With excellent eyebrows, divided by a vajra,

original: phyag na kha tv'am mi thod bsnams //
analyzed: phyag na kha tv'am mi thod bsnams //
translated: Holding a khaṭvāṅga and a skull cup in his hands,

original: brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with a garland of fifty skulls.

original: de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni //
analyzed: de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni //
translated: In front of him, the goddess

original: rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma; ;he ru ka dpal che la phyogs //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma; ;he ru ka dpal che la phyogs //
translated: and Śrī Heruka, the great one.

original: spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can yin //
analyzed: spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can yin //
translated: They have three eyes and wrathful forms.

original: ka p'a la ni aantva sa bkang //
analyzed: ka p'a la ni aantva sa bkang //
translated: The skull cup is filled with entrails.

original: kha nas ru dhi ra 'dzag cing //
analyzed: kha nas ru dhi ra 'dzag cing //
translated: Blood drips from their mouths.🔽They make a threatening gesture in all directions

original: lha dang lha min mir bcas pa //🔽phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mir bcas pa // phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed //
translated: to the gods, demigods, and humans.

original: mkha' mgro ma ni nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: mkha' mgro ma ni nyi shu bzhi //
translated: The ḍākinīs are twenty-four,

original: phag mo yi ni rigs las byung //
analyzed: phag mo yi ni rigs las byung //
translated: originating from the family of Vārāhī.🔽They should be worshipped in the directions and intermediate directions

original: phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang // 'khor lo'i dbus su mchod par bya //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang // 'khor lo'i dbus su mchod par bya //
translated: and in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang //
translated: In the same way, the heroes

original: 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod //
analyzed: 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod //
translated: should be worshipped, abiding in the maṇḍala.

original: sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod //
analyzed: sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod //
translated: If the adept desires accomplishments,🔽he should worship the nondual hero.

original: gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya; ;de nas bum pa bya ba ni //
analyzed: gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya; ;de nas bum pa bya ba ni //
translated: Then, the rite of the vase:

original: rtsa pa nag po la sogs med //
analyzed: rtsa pa nag po la sogs med //
translated: without a stalk, black, and so on,🔽pearl, gold, gem,

original: mu tig gser dang rin chen dang // byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste //
analyzed: mu tig gser dang rin chen dang // byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste //
translated: coral, silver, and copper,

original: bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i //
analyzed: bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i //
translated: filled with all edibles,

original: @78b snod ni steng du gzhag par bya //
analyzed: @78b snod ni steng du gzhag par bya //
translated: the vessel should be placed above.

original: mgrin pa slad bus dkri ba dang // kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya //
analyzed: mgrin pa slad bus dkri ba dang // kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya //
translated: and the mouth is adorned with a lotus.

original: gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa //
analyzed: gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa //
translated: Well wrapped with a pair of cloths,

original: brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod //
analyzed: brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod //
translated: the eight are placed at the doors.

original: gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa'i //
analyzed: gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa'i //
translated: Well wrapped with a pair of cloths,

original: bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /
analyzed: bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /
translated: the nine vases are placed in the center.

original: gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam //🔽mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya //
analyzed: gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam // mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya //
translated: Adorned with gold, silver, jewels,🔽and pearls,

original: dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang // gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang // gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya //
translated: the maṇḍala is beautified with jewels and gold.

original: grong mchog yid 'ong mchod pa ni //
analyzed: grong mchog yid 'ong mchod pa ni //
translated: The supreme city is pleasing to offer;

original: grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
analyzed: grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt of accomplishment.

original: bdag nyid kun nas zhal la ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid kun nas zhal la ni //

analyzed: yi ge bam dang yom dang ni //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che //
translated: The great awareness of the ḍākinīs

analyzed: ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Has not arisen and will not arise.

original: sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi //
analyzed: sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi //
translated: On the surface of the earth, the four jewels

original: phreng ba'i sngags ni dam pa yin //
analyzed: phreng ba'i sngags ni dam pa yin //
translated: Are the supreme garland mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che //
translated: The great awareness of the ḍākinīs

original: rig pa'i rgyal po he ru ka /
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po he ru ka /
translated: Is the awareness king Heruka.

original: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: From the glorious Heruka’s definitive expression,

original: go zlog pa'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////🔽de nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi //
analyzed: go zlog pa'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o //// de nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi //
translated: Chapter 8: The Chapter on the Heart of the Repelling and the Procedure of Extracting the Mantra of the Six Yoginīs.🔽Then, the supreme activities of the root mantra,

original: las mchog go rim ji bzhin du //
analyzed: las mchog go rim ji bzhin du //
translated: in proper sequence,

original: de ni rnam par bshad par bya //
analyzed: de ni rnam par bshad par bya //
translated: will now be explained.

original: 'jig rten gsum gang ci yod rnams //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gang ci yod rnams //
translated: Whatever exists in the three worlds,

original: thams cad skad cig gis grub par //
analyzed: thams cad skad cig gis grub par //
translated: all of it is accomplished in an instant.

original: las rnams thams cad byed pa 'o //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad byed pa 'o //
translated: It performs all activities.

original: lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad kyi skye gnas thams cad dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do //
analyzed: lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad kyi skye gnas thams cad dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do //
translated: By merely remembering it, one can kill all gods, all nāgas, all yakṣas, and all gandharvas.

original: sprin thams cad 'thor ba dang / char 'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sprin thams cad 'thor ba dang / char 'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: It disperses all clouds, causes rain to fall, and stops it.

original: rgya mtsho skem par byed do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho skem par byed do //
translated: It dries up the ocean.

original: chu bo rgyun phyogs las ldog ste 'bang par ston to //
analyzed: chu bo rgyun phyogs las ldog ste 'bang par ston to //
translated: It causes rivers to flow in the opposite direction.

original: dbang po zlog par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po zlog par byed do //
translated: It reverses the power of the senses.

original: gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas sa g-yo bar byed pa dang / shing la 'dzegs te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas sa g-yo bar byed pa dang / shing la 'dzegs te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
translated: By reciting this mantra one hundred thousand times, one can cause the earth to shake, and climbing a tree, one can go wherever one wishes.

original: @89a *// sngags thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: @89a *// sngags thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do //
translated: One can steal all mantras and all powers.

original: khrag 'dren par byed pa dang // slar yang gtong bar byed do //
analyzed: khrag 'dren par byed pa dang // slar yang gtong bar byed do //
translated: One can draw out blood and also send it back.

original: gzugs brgya stong phrag du mar byed do //
analyzed: gzugs brgya stong phrag du mar byed do //
translated: One can create many hundreds of thousands of forms.

original: 'dod na snang bar byed cing 'dod na mi snang bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na snang bar byed cing 'dod na mi snang bar byed do //
translated: If one wishes, one can make oneself visible; if one wishes, one can make oneself invisible.

original: khang bzang dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa phye mar byed do //
analyzed: khang bzang dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa phye mar byed do //
translated: One can reduce to dust palaces, treetops, and so on.

original: dug bdud rtsir byed pa dang / bdud rtsi yang dug tu byed do //
analyzed: dug bdud rtsir byed pa dang / bdud rtsi yang dug tu byed do //
translated: One can turn poison into nectar and nectar into poison.

original: zla ba chur byed pa dang chu zla bar byed do //
analyzed: zla ba chur byed pa dang chu zla bar byed do //
translated: One can turn the moon into water and water into the moon.

original: dri thams cad 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: dri thams cad 'phrog par byed do //
translated: One can steal all smells.

original: gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do; ;nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang / 'gro ba 'byin par byas pa zhi ba 'dus pa'i lha mo dang gang zhig kun tu spyod pa'i mi'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do; ;nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang / 'gro ba 'byin par byas pa zhi ba 'dus pa'i lha mo dang gang zhig kun tu spyod pa'i mi'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever one wishes, one will be able to move. The face of Garuḍa, the remover of beings, the peaceful goddess, and the glory that is in the palm of the hand of any human who practices this will be invincible.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu thams cad skal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu thams cad skal par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will obtain all the fruits of accomplishments in accordance with the rite.

original: dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed pa dang / mi skyed par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed pa dang / mi skyed par byed do //
translated: By merely remembering it, one will be able to kill or revive.

original: sa 'og rnam par gshegs par byed pa dang / ser ba 'bebs pa dang yang zlog par byed de //
analyzed: sa 'og rnam par gshegs par byed pa dang / ser ba 'bebs pa dang yang zlog par byed de //
translated: One will be able to travel underground, cause hail, and stop it.

original: dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed do; ;lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gar byed du 'jug go /
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed do; ;lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gar byed du 'jug go /
translated: By merely remembering it, one will be able to produce lightning and make all the gods dance.

original: gang gis bsgrub pa'i phyir ming nas bzung ste lan gcig bzlas na de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis bsgrub pa'i phyir ming nas bzung ste lan gcig bzlas na de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely reciting the name of any being to be accomplished, one will instantly kill them.

original: sa @89b ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa @89b ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will enjoy all the lands.

original: 'dod na sdud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod na sdud par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes, one can gather them.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di la ni /
analyzed: 'di la ni /
translated: in this case,

original: brtul zhugs mi dgos /
analyzed: brtul zhugs mi dgos /
translated: there is no need for observances,

original: spyod pa dang smyung ba mi dgos te //
analyzed: spyod pa dang smyung ba mi dgos te //
translated: no need for conduct or fasting.

original: rtog pa'i bya ba cho ga 'dis ci 'dod pa'i las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: rtog pa'i bya ba cho ga 'dis ci 'dod pa'i las rnams bya'o //
translated: With this ritual of conceptual action, one should perform any desired activity.

original: gal te khros pas lan gcig bzlas na /
analyzed: gal te khros pas lan gcig bzlas na /
translated: If one recites it angrily,

original: bye ba gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bye ba gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will kill ten million.

original: zhi bas bzlas na /
analyzed: zhi bas bzlas na /
translated: If one recites it peacefully,

original: 'tsho bar byed do //
analyzed: 'tsho bar byed do //
translated: one will bring life.

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan gcig bzlas pas gang la bsnun pa de'i mod la ltung bar byed do //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan gcig bzlas pas gang la bsnun pa de'i mod la ltung bar byed do //
translated: With charnel ground ash, one should recite it once and strike with it. Whoever is struck will fall down at that very moment.

original: thal ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsnun na /
analyzed: thal ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsnun na /
translated: If one recites it over ashes and strikes with it,

original: de'i mod la sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i mod la sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: at that very moment they will be seized by a flesh-eater.

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas nas spang leb la sogs pa la mtshan ma gang gi ming bris pa de gdon chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas nas spang leb la sogs pa la mtshan ma gang gi ming bris pa de gdon chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: With charnel ground ash, one should recite it once and write the name of the target on a wooden tablet or the like. They will be seized by a great spirit.

original: aa ti mugta'i lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas nas gang la bsnun pa de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa ti mugta'i lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas nas gang la bsnun pa de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted a branch of aśmantaka once, one should strike with it whatever [person one wants to enthrall]; he will come immediately with the speed of the wind.

original: bseg ma la lan gcig bzlas te gang la brdegs pa de rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bseg ma la lan gcig bzlas te gang la brdegs pa de rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted a straw once, one should strike with it whatever [person one wants to enthrall]; he will be paralyzed.

original: gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should go wherever one wishes.

original: gyi bdug pa la lan gcig bzlas te spos su sbyar na /
analyzed: gyi bdug pa la lan gcig bzlas te spos su sbyar na /
translated: Having enchanted once a fumigation, one should fumigate with it;

original: sems can thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all beings will be enthralled.

original: lag pa la lan gcig bzlas  bkab na nag pos zin pa  dug sos par byed do //
analyzed: lag pa la lan gcig bzlas  bkab na nag pos zin pa  dug sos par byed do //
translated: Having enchanted one’s hand once, one should cover [one’s hand] with it; one will cure poisoning by a black [snake].

original: mkha' 'gros rgyas btab pa la lan gcig bzlas pa'i chus de gtong bar byed do //🔽k'a ra b'i @90a *//
analyzed: mkha' 'gros rgyas btab pa la lan gcig bzlas pa'i chus de gtong bar byed do // k'a ra b'i @90a *//
translated: Having enchanted once with water, one should release [the person] who is sealed by a ḍākinī.

original: ra'i lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas pas mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ra'i lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas pas mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted once a branch of karavīra, one should transfer [the fetus] to wherever one wishes.

original: he ru ka dpal ye shes ni //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal ye shes ni //
translated: The knowledge of Śrī Heruka

original: mi shes dngos grub mngon 'dod pa //
analyzed: mi shes dngos grub mngon 'dod pa //
translated: is desired for the attainment of ignorance.

original: de ni phub ma brdung ba ste //
analyzed: de ni phub ma brdung ba ste //
translated: That is the beating of the drum.

original: gsang sngags 'di ni med pa ru //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di ni med pa ru //
translated: Without this mantra,

original: dngos grub dang ni bde ba dag /
analyzed: dngos grub dang ni bde ba dag /
translated: And the siddhis and happiness.🔽

original: mi yis thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi yis thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not attain accomplishments and happiness.🔽The yogī who desires to attain

original: gsang sngags 'di ni mi shes par //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di ni mi shes par //
translated: without knowing this mantra

original: rnal 'byor pa ni mngon 'dod pa //🔽de yi ngal ba don med de //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni mngon 'dod pa // de yi ngal ba don med de //
translated: will have fruitless toil,

original: 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro //🔽gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa'i //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro // gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa'i //
translated: and will not attain the result.🔽This mantra bestows all accomplishments🔽to one who practices it.

original: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed yin; ;sgrub po sngags dang phyag rgya dag /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed yin; ;sgrub po sngags dang phyag rgya dag /
translated: The adept who knows this mantra and mudrā

original: bder gshegs gsungs pa 'di shes pa //
analyzed: bder gshegs gsungs pa 'di shes pa //
translated: taught by the Sugata🔽will attain all accomplishments

original: bza' btung la sogs tsa ru yi //
analyzed: bza' btung la sogs tsa ru yi //
translated: through the taste of food, drink, and so forth.

original: bza' dang btung ba'i ro sogs pa //
analyzed: bza' dang btung ba'i ro sogs pa //
translated: The taste of food and drink and so forth

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin //🔽dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin // dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
translated: is the means of attaining all accomplishments.🔽CHAPTER 9

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
translated: The Procedure of the Ritual Actions of the Root Mantra

original: de nas sku gsum bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas sku gsum bshad par bya //
translated: Now, the three bodies will be explained.

original: khrag 'thung dpal gnyis med sbyor bas //
analyzed: khrag 'thung dpal gnyis med sbyor bas //
translated: The glorious Heruka, the union of nonduality,

original: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: by merely knowing whom

original: 'dir ni grub par the tshom med //
analyzed: 'dir ni grub par the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt of accomplishment here.

original: sku gsum po ni bshad par bya //🔽chos kyi sku yi lus can du //
analyzed: sku gsum po ni bshad par bya // chos kyi sku yi lus can du //
translated: The three bodies are to be explained.🔽When the practitioner becomes

original: gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //🔽de ltar legs sems gyur pa la //
analyzed: gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba // de ltar legs sems gyur pa la //
translated: endowed with the body of the Dharma body,

original: de tshe ye shes nga smra 'o //
analyzed: de tshe ye shes nga smra 'o //
translated: then I declare that wisdom.🔽When the practitioner becomes

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus can @90b du; ;gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus can @90b du; ;gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //
translated: endowed with the body of the enjoyment body,

original: de nas mnyam par bzhag pa la //
analyzed: de nas mnyam par bzhag pa la //
translated: then, in equipoise,

original: longs spyod rdzogs par nga rab smra //🔽sprul pa'i sku yi lus can du //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs par nga rab smra // sprul pa'i sku yi lus can du //
translated: I declare the enjoyment body.🔽When the practitioner becomes

original: gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //
translated: endowed with the body of the emanation body,

original: de tshe sems de rtse gcig la //
analyzed: de tshe sems de rtse gcig la //
translated: then, in that one-pointed mind,

original: sprul pa'i skur yang nga smra ste //
analyzed: sprul pa'i skur yang nga smra ste //
translated: I declare the emanation body.🔽There is no doubt that the attainment

original: ye shes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul //
analyzed: ye shes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul //
translated: of the wisdom, enjoyment, and emanation bodies

original: yang dag thob par gdon mi za //
analyzed: yang dag thob par gdon mi za //
translated: will be attained by one who is

original: bdag nyid shr'i he ru kar ni //🔽'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: bdag nyid shr'i he ru kar ni // 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: the Śrī Heruka.

original: gsang sngags 'di yi snying po ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di yi snying po ni //
translated: The essence of this mantra

original: gsang ba bshad kyi sgrub po nyon //
analyzed: gsang ba bshad kyi sgrub po nyon //
translated: is explained in the secret, so listen, practitioner.

original: snying po bzlas pas dpag tshad bye ba 'phags pa 'gyur zhing 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po bzlas pas dpag tshad bye ba 'phags pa 'gyur zhing 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting the essence mantra, one will fly up ten million leagues and come and go.

original: gzugs stong phrag du mar byed do //
analyzed: gzugs stong phrag du mar byed do //
translated: One will create many thousands of forms.

original: khang bzang dang shing dang khyim la 'dzegs te mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang lhan cig dpag tshad bye ba'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khang bzang dang shing dang khyim la 'dzegs te mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang lhan cig dpag tshad bye ba'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will ascend to palaces, trees, and houses and travel with the sky-goers up to ten million leagues.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'ong ba las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'ong ba las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will come and go through the sky and not become anything else.

original: 'dod na snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod na snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes, one will become visible; if one wishes, one will become invisible.

original: 'dod na byis pa dang / rgan po dang / dar la bab pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod na byis pa dang / rgan po dang / dar la bab pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes, one will assume the form of a child, an old person, or a young person.

original: 'dod na glang po che dang / ma he dang / ba men dang / stag dang / seng+ge dang / khyu mchog dang / byi la dang / ri bong dang / rnga mo 'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod na rma bya dang /
analyzed: 'dod na glang po che dang / ma he dang / ba men dang / stag dang / seng+ge dang / khyu mchog dang / byi la dang / ri bong dang / rnga mo 'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod na rma bya dang /
translated: If one wishes, one will assume the form of an elephant, a buffalo, a gayal, a tiger, a lion, a bull, a cat, a rabbit, or a camel, and if one wishes, the form of a peacock, a parrot, a myna bird, a cuckoo, a swan, a crane, a vulture, a crow, or a dove.

original: khyim bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod dang / bya rgod gi gzugs 'dzin par @91a *//
analyzed: khyim bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod dang / bya rgod gi gzugs 'dzin par @91a *//
translated: He can assume the form of a peacock, goose, curlew, heron, owl, hawk, vulture, or any other bird.

original: 'gyur ro // gang 'dod pa de'i gzugs su byed do //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // gang 'dod pa de'i gzugs su byed do //
translated: He can assume any form he wishes.

original: tshig 'phrog pa dang / mthong ba 'phrog pa dang / nyan pa 'phrog pa dang / sna 'phrog pa dang / lce 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: tshig 'phrog pa dang / mthong ba 'phrog pa dang / nyan pa 'phrog pa dang / sna 'phrog pa dang / lce 'phrog par byed do //
translated: He can steal speech, sight, hearing, smell, or taste.

original: gang gi 'dod pa de'i khrag 'dren par byed pa'am /
analyzed: gang gi 'dod pa de'i khrag 'dren par byed pa'am /
translated: He can draw out the blood of anyone he wishes,

original: rengs par byed do //
analyzed: rengs par byed do //
translated: or paralyze him.

original: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: This concludes the tenth chapter of the glorious Herukābhidhāna,

original: sku gsum grub pa'i snying po'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
analyzed: sku gsum grub pa'i snying po'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
translated: the ritual action of the essence mantra of the three-kāya siddhi.

original: de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa pos //
translated: Now, moreover, the adept

original: skye ba bdun pa'i bar 'byung ba //
analyzed: skye ba bdun pa'i bar 'byung ba //
translated: should rely on a woman who has arisen in seven days,🔽by whom, merely through reliance,

original: gang gis bsten pa tsam gyis ni; ;myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis bsten pa tsam gyis ni; ;myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa'o //
translated: he will quickly enter into siddhi.

original: dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad par bya //
analyzed: dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the one who will attain siddhi.

original: skyes bu gang zhig rdul gyi dri zhim par gyur pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / yun ring por mig mi 'dzum pa dang / khro ba med par 'gyur ba dang / kha nas dbugs dri zhim par 'byung ba de ni //
analyzed: skyes bu gang zhig rdul gyi dri zhim par gyur pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / yun ring por mig mi 'dzum pa dang / khro ba med par 'gyur ba dang / kha nas dbugs dri zhim par 'byung ba de ni //
translated: One who has the fragrance of dust, who speaks the truth, who does not blink for a long time, who is free from anger, and whose breath smells sweet,

original: skye ba bdun du mi'i skye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba bdun du mi'i skye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: is one who has been born seven times as a human.

original: grib ma bdun pa bya dang pa'i 'gros can snying rje dang yang dag par ldan pa de bstan na //
analyzed: grib ma bdun pa bya dang pa'i 'gros can snying rje dang yang dag par ldan pa de bstan na //
translated: The seventh shadow is that of a bird. One who is endowed with compassion should point it out.

original: de'i snying ga na ro tsan yod de //
analyzed: de'i snying ga na ro tsan yod de //
translated: There is vermillion in his heart.

original: de blangs la dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas thig le byas na steng du lding bar 'gyur zhing dpag tshad bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de blangs la dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas thig le byas na steng du lding bar 'gyur zhing dpag tshad bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Taking that, one should make a bindu with it, having enchanted it one hundred and eight times with the essence mantra of glorious Heruka. One will fly up and travel ten million leagues.

original: de bstan pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bstan pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely pointing it out, one will become a knower of the three worlds.

original: dpag tshad bye ba @91b lnga bcur nyin zhag gcig gis 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpag tshad bye ba @91b lnga bcur nyin zhag gcig gis 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will go and come in a single day a distance of fifty million leagues.

original: lha'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will also obtain a divine body.

original: dpal he ru ka'i snying po gang zhig shes pa de gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i snying po gang zhig shes pa de gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever one who knows the essence of Śrī Heruka desires, that will be granted.

original: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: From the Utterance of Śrī Heruka,

original: skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
translated: the eleventh chapter on the procedure of the characteristics of the seven-born one.🔽Next, the quintessence

original: de nas nye ba'i snying po ni; ;dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed cing //
analyzed: de nas nye ba'i snying po ni; ;dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed cing //
translated: is the entrance to all powers,

original: 'jig rten gsum 'gyur gang cung zad //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum 'gyur gang cung zad //
translated: and whatever there is in the three worlds

original: de kun skad cig gis 'grub bshad //
analyzed: de kun skad cig gis 'grub bshad //
translated: is said to be accomplished in an instant.

original: tapha h'um h'um ha ha hr'i: aom//
analyzed: tapha h'um h'um ha ha hr'i: aom//
translated: ṭphaṃ hūṃ hūṃ ha ha hriḥ oṃ

original: 'di ni snying po'i nye ba'i snying pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po'i nye ba'i snying pa'o //
translated: This is the quintessence of the essence.

original: gsang sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum yang g-yo bar byed do //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum yang g-yo bar byed do //
translated: By reciting this mantra a hundred thousand times, even the three worlds will shake.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci rnams 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci rnams 'gugs par byed do //
translated: It summons gods, demigods, yakṣas, rākṣasas, nāgas, gandharvas, and kinnaras.

original: rgya mtsho dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u la sogs pa skem pa'am /
analyzed: rgya mtsho dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u la sogs pa skem pa'am /
translated: He can dry up the oceans, rivers, lakes, and so forth,

original: gnon par byed do //
analyzed: gnon par byed do //
translated: or he can make them overflow.

original: gang du bzlas pa'i gnas der mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du bzlas pa'i gnas der mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the place where one recites, all the ḍākinīs will do the bidding of the practitioner.

original: 'dis chu la yongs su bzlas te bdag nyid kyi mig bkrus na /
analyzed: 'dis chu la yongs su bzlas te bdag nyid kyi mig bkrus na /
translated: Having enchanted water with this [mantra], if one washes one’s eyes,

original: skye ba bdun pa'i mi shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba bdun pa'i mi shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will know [the events of] seven lifetimes.

original: tshe zad pa yang 'chi ba bzhin du snang ba dang / tshe ring ba gson bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe zad pa yang 'chi ba bzhin du snang ba dang / tshe ring ba gson bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One’s life will appear as if it were ending, and one will appear to be alive with a long life.

original: mig la mngon par bsngags nas gang la bltas pa de @92a *//
analyzed: mig la mngon par bsngags nas gang la bltas pa de @92a *//
translated: Having enchanted one’s eyes, whoever one looks at

original: gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be paralyzed.

original: dpa' bo shi ba'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa blangs te /
analyzed: dpa' bo shi ba'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa blangs te /
translated: One should take the skin from the soles of the feet of a dead hero,

original: mi'i khrag dang btags te rna ba'i mig sman dang thod par bcug la ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / khrag dang bsnol te grib ma la bskams la lcags gsum gyis dkris par bya ste /
analyzed: mi'i khrag dang btags te rna ba'i mig sman dang thod par bcug la ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / khrag dang bsnol te grib ma la bskams la lcags gsum gyis dkris par bya ste /
translated: mix it with human blood, and insert it into the ear of a skull together with collyrium, realgar, saffron, and blood. Having dried it in the shade, one should wrap it in the three metals.

original: yang de lhag par gnas pa skar ma rgyal la bya ba yang dpal he ru ka'i zhal du bcug la lag pa g-yon pas kha bkab ste yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
analyzed: yang de lhag par gnas pa skar ma rgyal la bya ba yang dpal he ru ka'i zhal du bcug la lag pa g-yon pas kha bkab ste yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
translated: Moreover, if one inserts the thumb into the mouth of Śrī Heruka and recites the mantra one hundred and eight times while covering one’s mouth with one’s left hand,

original: de de'i mod la mi snang bar 'gyur zhing grib ma med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de de'i mod la mi snang bar 'gyur zhing grib ma med par 'gyur te /
translated: he will immediately disappear and become shadowless.

original: lha rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: lha rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: If he is not seen even by the gods,

original: sa steng gi mi rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos //
analyzed: sa steng gi mi rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos //
translated: what need is there to speak of people on the surface of the earth?

original: de bzhin du kha las bton na ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du kha las bton na ni /
translated: In the same way, if one takes him out of one’s mouth,

original: snang par 'gyur ro //🔽rgyud 'dir mkha' spyod grub pa'i ril bu 'di ni /
analyzed: snang par 'gyur ro // rgyud 'dir mkha' spyod grub pa'i ril bu 'di ni /
translated: he will appear.

original: dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This pill for achieving the sky-farer is taught by the hero himself in this Tantra.

original: dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying bo'i sngags 'dis mdzub mo'i rtses mgo'i thod pa'i sha med par byas la mnyes na /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying bo'i sngags 'dis mdzub mo'i rtses mgo'i thod pa'i sha med par byas la mnyes na /
translated: With the mantra of the essence of the essence of Śrī Heruka, one should rub the flesh of the skull of the head with the tip of one’s thumb.🔽If one rubs it,

original: de'i phrag 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phrag 'dren par byed do //
translated: he will enter.

original: g-yon pas yang dang yang du mnyes pas ni /
analyzed: g-yon pas yang dang yang du mnyes pas ni /
translated: If one rubs it again and again with the left,

original: 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will enter.

original: mngon par bzlas te mgo'i thod par khu tshur bsnun na /
analyzed: mngon par bzlas te mgo'i thod par khu tshur bsnun na /
translated: If one strikes the skull with one’s fist, incanting it,

original: gang gi  smos te byas pa de'i klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi  smos te byas pa de'i klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: the head of him at whose name one does it will split.

original: gsang sngags rjes su dran @92b la thod pa 'o mas bkang na /
analyzed: gsang sngags rjes su dran @92b la thod pa 'o mas bkang na /
translated: If one remembers the mantra and fills the skull with milk,

original: nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: he will be pacified.

original: gi'u wang la bzlas te thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gi'u wang la bzlas te thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes a bindu with the guḍūcī, whoever one looks at will be sealed.

original: mdzub mo la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsdigs mdzub byas pa de de'i mod la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdzub mo la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsdigs mdzub byas pa de de'i mod la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one incants one’s finger and points at someone, he will fall down at that very moment.

original: sngags bzlas nas rkang pa sa la bsnun na /
analyzed: sngags bzlas nas rkang pa sa la bsnun na /
translated: If one recites the mantra and stamps one’s foot on the ground,

original: gang gi ming nas smos pa de de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi ming nas smos pa de de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: he at whose name one does it will die at that very moment.

original: chu la bzlas te sa la gtor na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu la bzlas te sa la gtor na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites the mantra over water and scatters it on the ground, he will come back to life.

original: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mos stong la yang sdigs mdzub byas na /
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mos stong la yang sdigs mdzub byas na /
translated: If one points at a thousand with the tip of one’s finger, incanting it with the mantra,

original: bltas pa de thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bltas pa de thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: all those at whom one points will be paralyzed.

original: tshig gis ni /
analyzed: tshig gis ni /
translated: By means of words

original: grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be freed.

original: rme sha can gyi thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te sems can gang rjes su dran pa de la bsnun pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rme sha can gyi thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te sems can gang rjes su dran pa de la bsnun pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Enchanting one hundred times the ashes of a burnt corpse, one should strike with it whatever being one thinks of; one will assume his form.

original: sbyin sreg gi me'i thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te gang la bsnun pa de lha nyid kyis mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi me'i thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te gang la bsnun pa de lha nyid kyis mi mthong ngo //
translated: Enchanting one hundred times the ashes of a funeral fire, one should strike with it whatever being one thinks of; he will not be seen by the gods.

original: chu la bzlas pas gtor na slar snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu la bzlas pas gtor na slar snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By sprinkling with enchanted water, one will again become visible.

original: thod pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyar bcings la dbugs mi 'phyin par gang gi ming nas bzlas pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thod pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyar bcings la dbugs mi 'phyin par gang gi ming nas bzlas pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Binding the skull-clasped-hands mudrā, one should not breathe out, but recite the mantra while thinking of the name of the one whom one wants to enthrall.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.

original: skye bo stong yang smyo bar 'gyur ro //🔽yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo stong yang smyo bar 'gyur ro // yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.🔽One will enthrall even a thousand people.

original: gang gi ming nas smos te gtsug phud la lan bcu bzlas te mdud na /🔽mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi ming nas smos te gtsug phud la lan bcu bzlas te mdud na / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

original: du bzlas pa de srid mi snang bar 'gyur ro //

original: dkrol na snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkrol na snang bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gseg ma la mngon par bzlas te steng dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor na /

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyang 'ching bar 'gyur ro; ;mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba thams cad kyang 'phrog par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: stan dang mal khri la skyes pa dang bud med 'du ba la bltas te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /

analyzed: 'byar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be stuck together.

original: yid kyis ni /
analyzed: yid kyis ni /
translated: Mentally,

original: grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be released.

analyzed: gyo mog dang bcas pa la yongs su bzlas te chu bor bcug nas bor na /

analyzed: phyogs las ldog ste 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: the current will be reversed.

analyzed: gyo mog dang bcas pa de nyid kyis dba' rlabs gnon par 'gyur ro //

original: yid kyis ni /
analyzed: yid kyis ni /
translated: By the mind,

original: bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will avert [them].

analyzed: sngags bzlas te steng du bltas bzhin du stong bzlas na /

analyzed: char chen po gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will stop a great rain.

original: gzhan gyi dpung mngon du phyogs na bzlas brjod stong byas te g-yul du zhugs pa na mtshon cha brgyas bsnun kyang gnod pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing mtshon gyis kyang chod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dpung mngon du phyogs na bzlas brjod stong byas te g-yul du zhugs pa na mtshon cha brgyas bsnun kyang gnod pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing mtshon gyis kyang chod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites a thousand [times] while facing an enemy army, and enters the battle, even if one is struck by a hundred weapons, one will not feel any pain, and one will not be cut by weapons.

original: rdo rje'i lus can du 'gyur ro //🔽dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus can du 'gyur ro // dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: One will have a vajra body.🔽This concludes the chapter on the ritual action of the quintessence mantra,

analyzed: @93b nye ba'i snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: the twelfth in the glorious Heruka Tantra.

original: de nas go cha'i las rnams ni //
analyzed: de nas go cha'i las rnams ni //
translated: Now, the ritual actions of the armor

original: 'jig rten gsum na gang yod pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na gang yod pa //
translated: are whatever exist in the three worlds.

original: yid la 'dod pa de dag kun //
analyzed: yid la 'dod pa de dag kun //
translated: All of those that are desired

original: go rim bzhin du bshad par bya //
analyzed: go rim bzhin du bshad par bya //

original: de la go cha zlos bzhin du yang lam du bzhugs na /
analyzed: de la go cha zlos bzhin du yang lam du bzhugs na /
translated: If one recites the armor while traveling on the road,

analyzed: rkun ma dang stag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba'am /

original: mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi snang bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: go cha zlos bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang gi bud med kyi gnas su zhugs na yang mi snang bar 'gyur te /

original: gang 'dod pa de blangs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang 'dod pa de blangs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

original: lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: go cha'i sngags brgya zlos pa'i lag pas gang la reg pa de mdung bzhin du rengs par 'gyur ro //

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang mi g-yo'o //

original: sngags zlos pa'i rkang pas bsnun na /
analyzed: sngags zlos pa'i rkang pas bsnun na /

original: thar par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thar par 'gyur ro //

original: rang gi khrag la lan gsum bzlas nas thig le byas la gang dang lhan cig smra ba dang / gang gis mthong zhing gang mthong ba de thams cad kyi khrag 'dren par byed do //

original: gang gi khyim du khro ba dang bcas pas lan stong bzlas na /
analyzed: gang gi khyim du khro ba dang bcas pas lan stong bzlas na /

analyzed: thams cad la rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all will be struck with fever.

original: chu la lan lnga bzlas te gtor na /
analyzed: chu la lan lnga bzlas te gtor na /

original: slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //

original: gang gi gdong la bltas te bzlas pa de'i tshig 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi gdong la bltas te bzlas pa de'i tshig 'phrog par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'bab chu'i 'gro ma dang lteng kar gnas te stong bzlas na /

analyzed: chu'i steng du gnas te thang @94a *//

analyzed: lag pa gnyis dril phyis byas la lan stong bzlas na /

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang // khanda ro hi de bzhin te //
translated: khaṇḍarohās, and also

analyzed: gzugs can ma ru rab grags pa //

analyzed: de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma //

analyzed: de kun de yi dbang du 'gyur //

analyzed: skar ma rgyal gyi sbyor bas ras byas la //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de gyon pa'i lus kyis dpag tshad stong gi bar du nam mkhar mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro //

analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'gyur //

analyzed: shing yongs 'du'i khu bcud blangs la bzlas brjod stong byas te gang thig le byas pa de shing du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: chu la lan bdun bzlas pas gtor na /

analyzed: 'di ni / slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de glang po cher 'gyur ro // dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /

analyzed: go cha'i sngags gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////

analyzed: gang gis sgrub po 'grub pa yi; ;sgrub pa de ni bshad par bya //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang // khanda ro hi 'dod gzugs can /

analyzed: de yis gtor ma'i bya ba dag /

analyzed: de nyid mchog shes gang de 'dir //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ru the tshom med //

analyzed: dpal he ru ka bong bu'i rnam par mdzad pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas sdom pa rnams la ni //

analyzed: gang zhig brdar gyur shes pa dag /

analyzed: de nyid kyis de grub pa yin //

analyzed: the tshom med par bshad par bya //

analyzed: da zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad //

analyzed: bh'i zhes sring mo de bzhin te /

original: he zhes bya ba de bzhin sha //
analyzed: he zhes bya ba de bzhin sha //
translated: “da” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“dha” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“pa” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“pha” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“ba” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“bha” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“ya” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“ra” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“la” is a corpse-bearer,🔽“va” is a corpse

original: bha zhes bya ba za ba yin //
analyzed: bha zhes bya ba za ba yin //
translated: Bha is said to be “eating.”

original: bhu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin //🔽p'i zhes dur khrod de bzhin te //
analyzed: bhu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin // p'i zhes dur khrod de bzhin te //
translated: Bhū is said to be “mixed.”🔽Pai is the charnel ground.

original: dhu zhes bya ba ro ru shes //
analyzed: dhu zhes bya ba ro ru shes //
translated: Dhū is said to be “corpse.”

original: dhi zhes rnal 'byor ma ru bshad //🔽gang zhes de bzhin l'a ma yin //
analyzed: dhi zhes rnal 'byor ma ru bshad // gang zhes de bzhin l'a ma yin //
translated: Dhī is said to be “yoginī.”🔽Ga is said to be “lāmā.”🔽Sti is said to be “rūpiṇī.”

original: sti zhes bya ba gzugs can ma //🔽ku zhes de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: sti zhes bya ba gzugs can ma // ku zhes de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: Ku is said to be “ḍākinī.”

original: ha ni @95b banta ro hi nyid //🔽dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis //
analyzed: ha ni @95b banta ro hi nyid // dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis //
translated: Ha is said to be “gārḍhinī.”🔽Ja is said to be “the two thighs.”

original: ka zhes bya ba dpung par gzung //🔽bha zhes bya ba gsong por smra //
analyzed: ka zhes bya ba dpung par gzung // bha zhes bya ba gsong por smra //
translated: Ka is said to be “the two arms.”🔽Bha is said to be “pleasant speech.”

original: sva zhes legs 'ongs bya ba yin //
analyzed: sva zhes legs 'ongs bya ba yin //
translated: Sva is said to be “welcome.”

original: mi zhes bya ba nya yin la //🔽ba zhes bya ba za ba yin //
analyzed: mi zhes bya ba nya yin la // ba zhes bya ba za ba yin //
translated: Mi is said to be “fish.”🔽Va is said to be “eating.”

original: pa zhes bya ba btung ba btung //
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba btung ba btung //
translated: Pa is said to be “drinking.”

original: gha ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin //
analyzed: gha ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin //
translated: Gha is said to be “approachable and unapproachable.”

original: ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin //
translated: Ka is said to be “desired.”

original: sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro /
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro /
translated: Sa is said to be “not going elsewhere.”🔽Ra is said to be “unmarried.”

original: ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo; ;du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo //
analyzed: ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo; ;du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo //
translated: Du is said to be “bad conduct.”

original: su zhes bya ba skal bzang ma //
analyzed: su zhes bya ba skal bzang ma //
translated: Su is said to be “fortunate.”

original: na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma //🔽sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can //
analyzed: na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma // sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can //
translated: Na is the unfortunate woman.🔽Sa is the one with samaya.

original: aa zhas bya ba dam tshig med //
analyzed: aa zhas bya ba dam tshig med //
translated: A is the one without samaya.

original: aa zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin //
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin //
translated: A is the one who has come.

original: na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin //
analyzed: na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin //
translated: Na is the one who has not come.

original: so zhes bya ba chags pa yin //
analyzed: so zhes bya ba chags pa yin //
translated: So is the one who is attached.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are

original: yi ge re re'i brda yin te //
analyzed: yi ge re re'i brda yin te //
translated: the symbolic designations of the individual syllables.

original: dpa' bo dang sring mor 'du shes par byed pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo dang sring mor 'du shes par byed pa /
translated: One should understand them as heroes and sisters,

original: gus pa dang mi gus pa la sbyin par bya ba dam tshig gi mchog yid du 'ong ba phan 'dogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gus pa dang mi gus pa la sbyin par bya ba dam tshig gi mchog yid du 'ong ba phan 'dogs par byed pa ste /
translated: and give them to the devoted and the non-devoted, the supreme samaya that is pleasing and helpful.

original: gus pa la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gus pa la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give to the devoted.

original: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las; yi ge'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las; yi ge'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the fifteenth chapter of the glorious Heruka Tantra, on the symbolic designations of the syllables.

original: de nas skal ldan skal ldan min //
analyzed: de nas skal ldan skal ldan min //
translated: Then, the fortunate and the unfortunate,

original: mdor bsdus nas ni rab bshad bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni rab bshad bya //
translated: will be explained in brief.

original: dam tshig mdog la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: dam tshig mdog la gnas pa ste //
translated: The one who abides in the color of samaya,

original: skal ldan yid 'ong phan 'dogs byed //
analyzed: skal ldan yid 'ong phan 'dogs byed //
translated: the fortunate, the pleasing, the helpful,

original: gus pa nyid la rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: gus pa nyid la rab sbyin bya //
translated: should be given to the devoted.

original: de nas rigs kyi dbye bzung na //
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi dbye bzung na //
translated: Then, having grasped the division of the families,

original: dpa' dang gnyis med rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: dpa' dang gnyis med rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The yoginīs are heroines and nondual.

original: @96a *// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: @96a *// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely knowing them,

original: sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the adept will attain power.

original: bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar gang //
analyzed: bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar gang //
translated: She who is as white as a lotus root,

original: padma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /
translated: with eyes long like lotus petals,

original: rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'//
analyzed: rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'//
translated: always fond of white garments,

original: tsandan gsar ba'i dri dang ldan //
analyzed: tsandan gsar ba'i dri dang ldan //
translated: with the scent of fresh sandalwood,

original: bde gshegs pa 'dus nyid la dga'//
analyzed: bde gshegs pa 'dus nyid la dga'//
translated: delighting in the very assembly of sugatas—

original: de rigs rus byung shes pa bya //
analyzed: de rigs rus byung shes pa bya //
translated: one should know her to be of the kṣatriya caste.

original: phud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing //
analyzed: phud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing //
translated: She who is like refined gold,

original: dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'//
analyzed: dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'//
translated: fond of red and yellow garments,

original: dza' ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan //
analyzed: dza' ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan //
translated: with the scent of jasmine—

original: de ni dpa' bo'i rjes 'gror 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni dpa' bo'i rjes 'gror 'gyur //
translated: she will follow the hero.

original: gang zhig autpal ltar sngo bsangs //
analyzed: gang zhig autpal ltar sngo bsangs //
translated: She who is dark blue like a blue lotus,

original: gos ni sngon po 'dzin la dga'//
analyzed: gos ni sngon po 'dzin la dga'//
translated: fond of wearing blue garments,

original: autpal sngon por snang ba'i dri //
analyzed: autpal sngon por snang ba'i dri //
translated: with the scent of a blue lotus—

original: de ni dpa' bo dran rjes 'gro //
analyzed: de ni dpa' bo dran rjes 'gro //
translated: she will follow the hero’s memory.

original: bud med gang zhig mdzes ma ste //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig mdzes ma ste //
translated: She who is a beautiful woman,

original: pags pa pad dkar 'dab 'dra ma //
analyzed: pags pa pad dkar 'dab 'dra ma //
translated: with skin like a white lotus petal,

original: rtag tu padma'i rtsa ba'i dri //
analyzed: rtag tu padma'i rtsa ba'i dri //
translated: always with the scent of lotus roots—

original: de ni de bzhin dpa' bo'i blo //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin dpa' bo'i blo //
translated: That is the mind of the hero.

original: dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang //
analyzed: dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang //
translated: A woman who is red and white,🔽beautiful, with red lips,

original: gzugs bzang kha ni dmar ba dang // ma li ka dang autpal dri //
analyzed: gzugs bzang kha ni dmar ba dang // ma li ka dang autpal dri //
translated: and the scent of jasmine and utpala,🔽is born into the Vajra family.

original: de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin; ;ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin; ;ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang //
translated: A woman who is yellow and green,

original: gos ni dkar po 'chang bar dga'//
analyzed: gos ni dkar po 'chang bar dga'//
translated: who likes to wear white clothes,

original: mgo la me tog dri dang ldan //
analyzed: mgo la me tog dri dang ldan //
translated: with a head fragrant with flowers,

original: de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin //
translated: follows the Tathagata family.

original: bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar //
translated: A woman who is red

original: de yi mdog gi gos 'chang zhing //
analyzed: de yi mdog gi gos 'chang zhing //
translated: and wears clothes of that color,

original: rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan //
analyzed: rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan //
translated: who is always fragrant with camphor,

original: rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin //
analyzed: rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin //

original: rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni //
translated: The families of the yoginis

original: de ltar bdun @96b po ngas bshad pa //
analyzed: de ltar bdun @96b po ngas bshad pa //
translated: are explained by me to be seven.

original: g-yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//
analyzed: g-yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//

original: 'di dag rang rgya'i mdog gis khyab //
analyzed: 'di dag rang rgya'i mdog gis khyab //
translated: They are pervaded by the color of their own family.

original: rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang //
analyzed: rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang //
translated: The seed syllables of the families

original: rigs kyi rjes su 'dir 'gyur ba //
analyzed: rigs kyi rjes su 'dir 'gyur ba //
translated: follow the families here.

original: 'di la kha dog drug tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di la kha dog drug tu 'gyur //
