original: rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang // rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra //
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang // rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra //
translated: She binds her own seal, and speaks the words that arise from her own family.

original: g-yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang //
analyzed: g-yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang //
translated: If a woman goes to the left,

original: rnal 'byor ma la'ang g-yon la brtag /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma la'ang g-yon la brtag /
translated: she should be regarded as a yoginī on the left.

original: skad ni chen por rab smra ba //
analyzed: skad ni chen por rab smra ba //
translated: She speaks in a loud voice,

original: g-yon nas blta bas rnam par lta //
analyzed: g-yon nas blta bas rnam par lta //
translated: and looks with a sidelong glance.

original: bud med rnams mthong rab smra ba //
analyzed: bud med rnams mthong rab smra ba //
translated: If she speaks when seeing women,

original: de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad //
analyzed: de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad //
translated: she is said to possess the commitments.

original: bud med rnams gang gsol gdab byed //
analyzed: bud med rnams gang gsol gdab byed //
translated: If a woman makes a request,

original: rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra //
translated: she speaks the seed of her family.

original: rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor zhing //
analyzed: rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor zhing //
translated: She does not abandon the activities of her family,

original: rang gi bstan bcos gsung pa skyong //
analyzed: rang gi bstan bcos gsung pa skyong //
translated: and she upholds the teachings of her own treatises.

original: rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos //
translated: She recites the knowledge of her own family;

original: de ni dam tshig ldan par brjod //
analyzed: de ni dam tshig ldan par brjod //
translated: she is said to possess the commitments.

original: phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba //
translated: If she bows with her left body,

original: g-yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud //
translated: she always bows with her left body.

original: lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba //
analyzed: lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba //
translated: If she speaks with the goddesses,

original: de ni nges par bden par 'gro //🔽mthe bong g-yon pas sa la ni //
analyzed: de ni nges par bden par 'gro // mthe bong g-yon pas sa la ni //
translated: she certainly goes for the truth.🔽If she draws a line on the ground with her left toe,

original: rkang pas ri mo 'bri byed cing //
analyzed: rkang pas ri mo 'bri byed cing //
translated: and

original: mgo ni dkrug par byed pa ste //
analyzed: mgo ni dkrug par byed pa ste //
translated: She shakes her head,🔽and looks askance.

original: zur gyis lta zhing lag g-yon gyis //🔽sgrub pa po la khyad par du //
analyzed: zur gyis lta zhing lag g-yon gyis // sgrub pa po la khyad par du //
translated: With her left hand

original: de yi rang rig dran pa'o //🔽mkhur ba'am kos ko drag dang ni //
analyzed: de yi rang rig dran pa'o // mkhur ba'am kos ko drag dang ni //
translated: she makes a special sign to the adept.🔽She touches her cheek or lips

original: sna dag tu ni sor mo ston //🔽zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig sngags //
analyzed: sna dag tu ni sor mo ston // zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig sngags //
translated: or her nose with her finger.🔽Looking askance, she recites the mantra

original: bzlas nas rig la rnam par lta //🔽bden par 'gro ba'i rnam 'byor ma //
analyzed: bzlas nas rig la rnam par lta // bden par 'gro ba'i rnam 'byor ma //
translated: once and looks at the adept.🔽The yoginīs are called

original: nges pa dam tshig can /🔽@97a *// yin no; ;dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
analyzed: nges pa dam tshig can / @97a *// yin no; ;dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
translated: the “truth-goers” and the “pledge-holders.”

original: rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid nges par brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid nges par brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the chapter on the examination of the characteristics of the yoginīs, the sixteenth in the glorious Herukābhidhāna.

original: de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Then, the difficult-to-attain yoginīs

original: de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
translated: and likewise the ḍākinīs

original: bdud rtsi rnams la yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: bdud rtsi rnams la yang dag 'byung //
translated: are truly born from the nectars.

original: ya mi n'i dang skrag byed ma //
analyzed: ya mi n'i dang skrag byed ma //
translated: Yāminī, Bhayāvarā,

original: nags tshal ma dang de bzhin 'jigs //
analyzed: nags tshal ma dang de bzhin 'jigs //
translated: Vanadevī, and likewise Bhīṣaṇī,

original: gzugs kun spyod ma mdzes ma dag /
analyzed: gzugs kun spyod ma mdzes ma dag /
translated: Rūpavatī, and the beautiful

original: bha su ra mkha' 'gro rnams bdun //
analyzed: bha su ra mkha' 'gro rnams bdun //
translated: Bhaṅkārā—these are the seven ḍākinīs.

original: bsdus ma rang mtshan nyid 'dir bshad //
analyzed: bsdus ma rang mtshan nyid 'dir bshad //
translated: The characteristics of the concise ones are explained here.

original: gzugs can ma dang tsum bi ka /
analyzed: gzugs can ma dang tsum bi ka /
translated: The one with form, the one with kisses,

original: l'a ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo //
analyzed: l'a ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo //
translated: the one with the brow, the one with the child,

original: mi ldog ae hi ka lha mo //
analyzed: mi ldog ae hi ka lha mo //
translated: the one with the non-returner, the goddess Ehi,

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bdun du bshad //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bdun du bshad //
translated: and the dakinis are explained as seven.🔽The one who looks with strong attachment,

original: mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang // smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang // smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing //
translated: dances with raised eyebrows,

original: sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud byed gang //
analyzed: sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud byed gang //
translated: and gathers the previous form

original: phyis ni 'jig par byed pa yin //
analyzed: phyis ni 'jig par byed pa yin //
translated: and later destroys it,

original: de ni gzugs can mar shes bya //
analyzed: de ni gzugs can mar shes bya //
translated: that one is known as the one with form.

original: dpa' bo gnyis med bstan par bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo gnyis med bstan par bya //
translated: The hero should be shown to be non-dual.

original: grung pa 'am yang na mi grung pa //
analyzed: grung pa 'am yang na mi grung pa //
translated: Whether clever or not clever,

original: byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pan //
analyzed: byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pan //
translated: the child is embraced and kissed.

original: de ni tsumbi kir zhes bya //
analyzed: de ni tsumbi kir zhes bya //
translated: That is called the one with kisses.

original: mkha' 'gro sdig pa 'joms ma yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro sdig pa 'joms ma yin //
translated: The dakini is the destroyer of evil.

original: zur lta gdong la khro gnyer ldan //
analyzed: zur lta gdong la khro gnyer ldan //
translated: She looks askance with a frowning face,🔽wrinkles her brow, makes threatening gestures,

original: smin ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang // dbugs 'byin 'jigs par byed gang yin //
analyzed: smin ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang // dbugs 'byin 'jigs par byed gang yin //
translated: and frightens with her breath.

original: 'di na gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin //
analyzed: 'di na gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin //
translated: Here, moreover, she does not breathe,

original: 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa //
translated: and frightens.

original: de ni @97b l'a ma yin par bstan //
analyzed: de ni @97b l'a ma yin par bstan //
translated: That is said to be the lamb.🔽Pigs, bears, cats,

original: phag dang dred dang byi la dang // lce sbyang ra dang rta dag dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa //
analyzed: phag dang dred dang byi la dang // lce sbyang ra dang rta dag dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa //
translated: monkeys, horses, and all those who are frightened there

original: yongs su gyur par de bshad do //
analyzed: yongs su gyur par de bshad do //
translated: are said to be the transformation.🔽Laughing with great joy,

original: shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang // song nas slar yang mi ldog pa //
analyzed: shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang // song nas slar yang mi ldog pa //
translated: having gone, not returning again,

original: rjes su chags pas gsol bar 'dod //
analyzed: rjes su chags pas gsol bar 'dod //
translated: desiring to request with passion,

original: khanda ro hir de bshad do //
analyzed: khanda ro hir de bshad do //
translated: that is said to be Khaṇḍarohā.

original: yid ni byung bas lag pa 'am //
analyzed: yid ni byung bas lag pa 'am //
translated: The mind is aroused by the hand,🔽or by a clod, or by the foot,

original: bong ba 'am ni rkang pas sam; ;gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis //
analyzed: bong ba 'am ni rkang pas sam; ;gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis //
translated: or by the hem of the garment, or by trees,

original: des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur //
analyzed: des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur //
translated: and by that contact, one does not live.

original: mi ldog par ni shes bya ste //
analyzed: mi ldog par ni shes bya ste //
translated: One should know that it is not to be reversed,

original: bsgrub bya min par de la brjod //
analyzed: bsgrub bya min par de la brjod //
translated: and that is said to be not to be accomplished.

original: dgod smra rgyu med pa ru ni //
analyzed: dgod smra rgyu med pa ru ni //
translated: Laughing and talking for no reason,

original: du zhing rab tu khros pa ste //
analyzed: du zhing rab tu khros pa ste //
translated: weeping and being very angry,

original: de ni ae r  dran bya //
analyzed: de ni ae r  dran bya //
translated: that is said to be Airāvatī.

original: lha mo gsong por smra ba yin //
analyzed: lha mo gsong por smra ba yin //
translated: The goddess is one who speaks pleasantly.

original: sangs rgyas pa dang rtag tu srma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa dang rtag tu srma //
translated: Always devoted to the Buddha and to Dharma,

original: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs las byung //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs las byung //
translated: that itself arises from the Vajra family.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya; ;dpa' bos bsten phyir mtshan par bya //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya; ;dpa' bos bsten phyir mtshan par bya //

original: thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // 'khor lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang // ral gri kun tu skrag byed nyid //
analyzed: thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // 'khor lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang // ral gri kun tu skrag byed nyid //
translated: the sword, and the terrifying itself,

analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur //

original: de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas //
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas //

analyzed: gus pa yis ni gtor ma @107b sbyin; ;rang 'dod las la rnal 'byor pas //

analyzed: myur du 'bad pas mchod bya ste //

analyzed: rdo rje phag mo myos byed sha rnams kyis //

analyzed: skye bo gus pas de rnams mchod byas pas //

analyzed: he ru ka dpal mngon dgar gyur pa la //

analyzed: sbyor des ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur //

analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //

analyzed: dag byed zas la bza' bar bya // rtag tu dam tshig @108a *//
translated: The Procedure of the Worship of the Heroes and Yoginis

original: spyod byas pa //🔽gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //🔽man ngag nyams par sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: spyod byas pa //🔽gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //🔽man ngag nyams par sbyin mi bya //
translated: The Procedure

original: dam tshig gnas la don ji bzhin //
analyzed: dam tshig gnas la don ji bzhin //
translated: And to those who keep their commitments, the truth.🔽

original: man ngag gnas kyang sbyin par bya //🔽pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
analyzed: man ngag gnas kyang sbyin par bya // pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
translated: One should give the instructions to one who abides in the commitments,🔽but not to one who does not abide in the commitments, even if he is a disciple.🔽One should not go to others out of delusion for the sake of desire,

original: 'dod la rmongs pas 'gro mi byed //🔽pho nya la rtag zhen thar pa //
analyzed: 'dod la rmongs pas 'gro mi byed // pho nya la rtag zhen thar pa //
translated: except for a messenger.

original: 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //🔽skye gnas dman dang gcig shos la'ang //
analyzed: 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya // skye gnas dman dang gcig shos la'ang //
translated: One should enjoy the messenger, even if she is a liberated woman.

original: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
translated: One should not serve a woman of low caste or a prostitute.

original: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas //🔽dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas // dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur //
translated: One should serve a mother, sister, daughter, or wife who is a messenger.🔽One should not serve a woman who is not a messenger.

original: 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la //
analyzed: 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la //
translated: One should summon a woman who is a wheel or a yoginī

original: mchod la lhan cig dgug par bya //
analyzed: mchod la lhan cig dgug par bya //
translated: to worship together.

original: de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin //
analyzed: de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin //
translated: Thus, the substances are ascertained.

original: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas spyod //🔽rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du 'dor //
analyzed: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas spyod // rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du 'dor //
translated: One should always practice in the world with the left.🔽One should put the left foot forward.

original: lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
translated: One should turn with the left hand.

original: g-yon gyi spyod pas rab mchod byed //🔽g-yon pas 'khyud pa tsam dang ni //
analyzed: g-yon gyi spyod pas rab mchod byed // g-yon pas 'khyud pa tsam dang ni //
translated: One should worship with left-hand conduct.🔽One should embrace with the left hand

original: g-yon pa yis ni mchod cing za //
analyzed: g-yon pa yis ni mchod cing za //
translated: and eat with the left hand.

original: brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs //
analyzed: brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs //
translated: The yogic discipline is not impaired, and the yogic discipline is complete.🔽

original: sgrub pa po ni bya ba brtson //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni bya ba brtson //
translated: The adept who is diligent in his duties🔽and who practices the conduct of the clan of the commitments

original: dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // gcig tu zas la spyod par byed //
analyzed: dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // gcig tu zas la spyod par byed //
translated: and who is devoted to the single food

original: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa //
analyzed: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa //
translated: practices in the five clans.🔽He should be known as belonging to the four clans

original: rigs bzhir rab tu brtag par bya; ;rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa //
analyzed: rigs bzhir rab tu brtag par bya; ;rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa //
translated: and as practicing in the one clan.

original: rnal 'byor grub pa rab tu mchod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor grub pa rab tu mchod //
translated: The adept is highly praised.🔽The food of the heroes is the flesh of cows, horses,

original: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang bya dag gis //
analyzed: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang bya dag gis //
translated: and dogs, and the flesh of birds.

original: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
translated: Having made a triangular maṇḍala,

original: @108b sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
analyzed: @108b sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
translated: even the buddhas will certainly be destroyed.

original: phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the mudrā and mantra,

original: dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin //
translated: so too is the food of the heroes.

original: shr'i he ru ka'i sprul pa ste //
analyzed: shr'i he ru ka'i sprul pa ste //
translated: The emanation of Śrī Heruka

original: nyes spyod bstan bcos kun rnams spangs //
analyzed: nyes spyod bstan bcos kun rnams spangs //
translated: has abandoned all treatises on bad conduct.

original: rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni //
translated: The grasping of permanence🔽is the protection in all actions,

original: las rnams kun la srung ba dang // bgegs med ji bzhin de sgrub pa //
analyzed: las rnams kun la srung ba dang // bgegs med ji bzhin de sgrub pa //
translated: and the accomplishment just as it is without obstacles.

original: 'dir ni 'gar yang 'grub ma yin //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'gar yang 'grub ma yin //
translated: Here it is not accomplished anywhere.

original: de yi pho nya ma mchog bzang //
analyzed: de yi pho nya ma mchog bzang //
translated: Her messenger is the excellent woman,

original: lhan cig brtson par ldan pa yin //
analyzed: lhan cig brtson par ldan pa yin //
translated: who is endowed with the same effort.

original: kun nas chags dga'i legs sbyor bas //
analyzed: kun nas chags dga'i legs sbyor bas //
translated: The union of the two, who are full of passion,

original: rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid //
translated: is the division of the substances of yoga.

original: bla ma'i man dag la chags pa //
analyzed: bla ma'i man dag la chags pa //
translated: The devotion to the guru

original: de ni don nor sbyin dang mtshungs //🔽dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
analyzed: de ni don nor sbyin dang mtshungs // dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las //
translated: is like the one who gives the gift of wealth.

original: nang gi sbyin sreg dang // rigs gcig dang ldan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: nang gi sbyin sreg dang // rigs gcig dang ldan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the chapter on the inner fire sacrifice and the ritual of possessing a single lineage, the twenty-eighth chapter of the glorious Heruka Tantra.

original: de nas gzhan yang bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bstan pa ni //
translated: Now, next, I will teach

original: pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba //
analyzed: pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba //
translated: the characteristics of the messenger,

original: gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba //
translated: by which one should understand

original: mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o //
translated: the one who abides in the dakini's vow.

original: ming po dang ni pha ngang yang //
analyzed: ming po dang ni pha ngang yang //
translated: The brother and the father

original: bdag po nyid du skad cig bshad //🔽lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la //
analyzed: bdag po nyid du skad cig bshad // lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la //
translated: are explained in an instant as the master himself.🔽The thick tongue, the reddish eyes,

original: rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin //
analyzed: rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin //
translated: the rough, reddish-brown hair,🔽always delighting in all common accomplishments,

original: thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang // bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'//
analyzed: thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang // bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'//
translated: recitation, and yogic discipline,

original: dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan //🔽pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas //
analyzed: dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan // pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas //
translated: And is endowed with mindfulness.

original: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //
translated: The twenty-four supreme dakinis,🔽such as the messenger and so forth,

original: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster //
analyzed: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster //
translated: grant the fruit of conduct and liberation.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos //🔽'dod pa'i @109a *//
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos // 'dod pa'i @109a *//
translated: Always recite the root mantra.

original: don kun sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: don kun sgrub byed pa //

analyzed: bdud kun rab tu zhi bar byed // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum //
translated: It pacifies all demons.🔽It grants the fruit of the play of yoga

original: rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster //
translated: in the three worlds, moving and unmoving.

original: gsang sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin //🔽sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin // sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
translated: This arises from this mantra.

original: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson //
translated: The adept who strives for power

original: phyag rgya dang bral gsang spags te //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang bral gsang spags te //
translated: with mantra and mudrā🔽will not attain power

analyzed: lus can rnams la 'grub mi 'gyur // ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag //
translated: without mudrā.🔽One should understand

original: mngon par brtson par rtogs par bya //
analyzed: mngon par brtson par rtogs par bya //
translated: the performance of heating with effort.🔽One who is hostile to the great yoga

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
translated: that accomplishes all desired aims

original: rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang // khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skyes te //
analyzed: rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang // khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skyes te //
translated: will be born a hundred times as a dog.

original: rme sha can du skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rme sha can du skye bar 'gyur //
translated: One will be born as a worm.

original: dper na la la mar 'dod pas //
analyzed: dper na la la mar 'dod pas //

original: 'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang //
analyzed: 'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang //

analyzed: mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi //
translated: But fresh butter will not arise;

original: lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad //
analyzed: lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad //

original: 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni //
analyzed: 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni //

analyzed: 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i //

original: rnal 'byor gzhan la bsten pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gzhan la bsten pa ni //

analyzed: gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur //

original: rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni //

original: yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa //

original: rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang //
analyzed: rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang //

analyzed: yul de yongs su brtags pa ste //
translated: That land is considered

original: sems can yongs su gzung ba'i rgyur //
analyzed: sems can yongs su gzung ba'i rgyur //
translated: In order to protect sentient beings

original: de ru nga ni brtag par gnas //
analyzed: de ru nga ni brtag par gnas //
translated: I dwell there, considered

original: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las /
translated: In the glorious Heruka's definitive statement,

original: pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa @109b dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa @109b dgu pa'o ////

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste //
analyzed: shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste //
translated: The very difficult to attain array,

original: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely knowing which

analyzed: myur du dngos grub sgrub byed pa'o //

original: sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong //
analyzed: sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong //

original: tsandan gyis ni nye bar byug /
analyzed: tsandan gyis ni nye bar byug /

original: dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni //
analyzed: dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni //

analyzed: me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing //

original: mar me'i phreng ba yang dag dkrigs //
analyzed: mar me'i phreng ba yang dag dkrigs //

analyzed: spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bar //

original: bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni //
analyzed: bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni //

analyzed: phyogs bcing pa ni byas nas su //
